name: National Domestic Violence Hotline
description: The National Domestic Violence Hotline provides free, confidential support 24/7 to anyone affected by relationship abuse. They serve all those impacted by relationship abuse with crisis intervention, emotional support, safety planning, and referrals to local resources. Services include phone support, live chat, text messaging, and AI chat assistance. They also provide information about identifying abuse, planning for safety, supporting others, and connecting with local domestic violence service providers.
source: Verified from official National Domestic Violence Hotline website
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week
notes: Administrative line: (737) 225-3150. Text "START" to 88788 for text support. Live chat available on website. AI chat assistant (Ruth) available at https://ruth.thehotline.org/. Spanish language support available at https://espanol.thehotline.org/. Teen and young adult support available through Love is Respect at https://www.loveisrespect.org/. Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NationalDomesticViolenceHotline/, Instagram: https://instagram.com/NDVHofficial/, Twitter: https://x.com/NDVH/, YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/NDVHotline/
